swap.notice:
yesBswap aims for price stabilization. To this end, as a measure to prevent a cataclysmic crash, if the daily sales volume exceeds a certain percentage (1%) of the total circulation volume, the sale will not be made.
This will resume at 9:00 KST the next day.

footer.policy:
BTC2 is providing with price stabilization technology
applied Patent Application No. 10-2023-0021406
